meanings.definition: A recording technique that allows for the separate recording of multiple sound sources on individual tracks.
meanings.sent1: The studio used a multitrack to record each instrument separately.
meanings.sent2: The musician edited the song using a multitrack device.
meanings.sent3: The multitrack made it easy to fix mistakes in the recording.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a multitrack, able to focus on different thoughts at once.
meanings.sent5: The multitrack recording captured every detail of the performance.

meanings.definition: A device or system used for multitrack recording.
meanings.sent1: The multitrack was essential for mixing the audio tracks.
meanings.sent2: He purchased a new multitrack for his home studio.
meanings.sent3: The multitrack device looked like a small computer.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed through the multitrack like a river.
meanings.sent5: The multitrack system improved the quality of the recordings.
